level.title: Package Management
level.description: Learn to install and manage software packages with apt/yum

exercises.title: Update Package List
exercises.description: Use 'apt update' to refresh the package list.

exercises.title: Install a Package
exercises.description: Use 'apt install' to install a package (e.g., curl).

exercises.title: Search for Package
exercises.description: Use 'apt search' to find packages related to 'web'.
hints: Shows all packages with 'web' in name

exercises.title: Remove a Package
exercises.description: Use 'apt remove' to uninstall a package.

exercises.title: Upgrade All Packages
exercises.description: Use 'apt upgrade' to update all installed packages.
